definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (upright one) De 32:15, De 33:5, De 33:26, Is 44:2; poetic name of Israel, designating it under its ideal character, LXX o( h)gaphme/nov, Aq Sym Theod eu)qu/v, Vulgate rectissimus, dilectus; Thes Ew:§ 167 a Lag:BN 33 regard it as dimin. fr. [[יׇשׁוּר]] = good little people; but no evidence that [[זּן]]- has a dimin. force, and most recent scholars De Di Dr MV Ges:§ 86 (2). 4 take as denom. = Rechtvolk; Bacher:ZAW v, 1885, 161 ff. and Che rightly compare [[סֵפֶר הַיׇּשָׁר]] (see [[יׇשָׁר]]
